title: Selects: How Gossip Works
itunes:title: Selects: How Gossip Works
description:
You know what I heard? That Josh and Chuck hate each other and they're just faking being friends for the show. That's called gossip, folks and it can do serious damage. Learn all about it in this classic episode.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
